alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, northwestern Pine and Carlton Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Kettle River, to Wahkon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cromwell and Kettle River around 820 PM CDT. Moose Lake around 830 PM CDT. Barnum around 835 PM CDT. Mahtowa and Nemadji around 840 PM CDT. Holyoke around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Grindstone Lake Pine County, Finlayson, Arthyde, Moose Lake State Park, Pleasant Valley, Duquette, Lawler, Dads Corner, Denham and Banning State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; South Aitkin
